pullRequest.body:
Also move some general results out of `PrimeCounting.lean`.

(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Moves:
- Vector.* -> Mathlib.Vector.*
- ...

Deletions:
- Nat.bit1_add_bit1
- ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

</details>

---

</details>
Note that you add 103 files to the import closure of `Mathlib.Data.Nat.PrimeFin`

> Note that you add 103 files to the import closure of `Mathlib.Data.Nat.PrimeFin`

Huh, not sure why I didn't catch that. I reverted that change
ðŸš€ Pull request has been placed on the maintainer queue by MichaelStollBayreuth.

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/11545186353/job/32131767320)

This feels like the sort of thing that should be delegated to `norm_num`.
I think it is nice like it is.

It would be nice to have
```
lemma Nat.count_eq_zero {P : â„• â†’ Prop} [DecidablePred P] (h : âˆƒ n, P n)  {n : â„•} :
    count P n = 0 â†” n â‰¤ nth P 0 := by
```
